meanings.sent1: The lunkhead couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a lunkhead; pay attention in class.
meanings.sent3: The lunkhead thought a tomato was a vegetable.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness turned him into a lunkhead in the argument.
meanings.sent5: The lunkhead's forgetfulness was legendary among his friends.

meanings.sent1: She felt like a lunkhead after forgetting her keys again.
meanings.sent2: The class clown often played the role of the lunkhead in skits.
meanings.sent3: The lunkhead tried to use a fork to eat soup.
meanings.sent4: His closed-mindedness made him a lunkhead in the eyes of his peers.
meanings.sent5: The lunkhead's antics always brought laughter to the group.
